input.sentences: we where staying at this awesome villa .
it had a real cozy feel .
it was so open and spacious .
plus a great spot for dinner .
output.sentences: They had been preparing the bar room all day.
The weather was looking delightful through the patio windows, it shouldn't be too hot to be an enjoyable day.
Plus, everything had turner out beautifully, the lighting was impeccable.
And the foyer provided a great natural light contrast to the more dim settings of the lounge.
Of course it would all begin with an early dinner on the terrace.
